interactionFilter.name: account_transaction
interactionFilter.expr: (itx.goal == 'execute payment transaction' || itx.subgoal == 'execute payment transaction') || (itx.goal == 'manage personal finances' || itx.subgoal == 'manage personal finances')

interactionFilter.name: mobileapp_consultation
interactionFilter.expr: (itx.goal == 'consult account' || itx.subgoal == 'consult account') && (itx.channel == 'mobile app' || itx.channel == 'Mobile App')

interactionFilter.name: mobileapp_purchase
interactionFilter.expr: (itx.goal == 'make purchase' || itx.subgoal == 'make purchase') && (itx.channel == 'mobile app' || itx.channel == 'Mobile App')

interactionFilter.name: mobileappusage
interactionFilter.expr: ((itx.goal == 'make purchase' || itx.subgoal == 'make purchase') && (itx.channel == 'mobile app' || itx.channel == 'Mobile App')) ||((itx.goal == 'consult account' || itx.subgoal == 'consult account') && (itx.channel == 'mobile app' || itx.channel == 'Mobile App'))

interactionFilter.name: portfolio_maintenance
interactionFilter.expr: itx.goal == 'manage product portfolio' || itx.subgoal == 'manage product portfolio'

formula.name: ABgroup
formula.expr: ( 50 > age && totalCashWithdrawalAmountPer30Days > 150 && totalCreditPurchasesPer30Days > 2 )? 'group A': ( age > 50 && 300 > totalCashWithdrawalAmountPer30Days && 5 > totalCreditPurchasesPer30Days)? 'group B': 'control group'

formula.name: flagActiveOwnership
formula.expr: ((flagSavingsAccount==1.0 && totalBalanceSA>=100) || (flagCheckingAccount==1.0 && totalPosBalanceCA>=100) ||flagRetirementAccount==1.0 ||flagMortgage==1.0 || flagHomeEquityLoan==1.0 || flagCarLoan==1.0 || flagPersonalLoan==1.0 || flagLifeInsurance==1.0) ? 1.0 : 0.0

formula.name: flagElitesMember
formula.expr: ((shareOfWallet > 17.52 && shareOfWallet <= 19.86) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts > 8 && totalActiveProducts <= 10)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 17.52 && shareOfWallet <= 19.86) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts > 10)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 17.52 && shareOfWallet <= 19.86) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 3583.82)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 90125 && totalAssets <= 109606) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts > 8)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 90125 && totalAssets <= 109606) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 3583.82)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 109606 && totalAssets <= 142235) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts <= 8)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 109606 && totalAssets <= 142235) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts > 8)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 109606 && totalAssets <= 142235) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 3583.82)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 142235) && (satisfaction <= 6.78)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 142235) && (satisfaction > 6.78 && satisfaction <= 7.37)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 142235) && (satisfaction > 7.37 && satisfaction <= 8.43) && (totalActiveProducts <= 8)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 142235) && (satisfaction > 7.37 && satisfaction <= 8.43) && (totalActiveProducts > 8 && totalActiveProducts <= 10) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 3964.82)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 142235) && (satisfaction > 8.43 && satisfaction <= 9.74) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 3964.82) && (totalActiveProducts <= 10)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 22.41) && (totalAssets <= 142235)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 22.41) && (totalAssets > 142235) && (satisfaction <= 7.37) && (totalActiveProducts <= 10))

formula.name: flagNewWorldlyAdoptersMember
formula.expr: ((shareOfWallet > 12.45 && shareOfWallet <= 17.52) && (totalActiveProducts > 3 && totalActiveProducts <= 4) && (totalAssets > 38528)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 12.45 && shareOfWallet <= 17.52) && (totalActiveProducts > 4 && totalActiveProducts <= 6) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 2291) && (totalAssets <= 90125) && (totalWebConsultationsPer60Days > 4)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 12.45 && shareOfWallet <= 17.52) && (totalActiveProducts > 4 && totalActiveProducts <= 6) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 2291) && (totalAssets > 90125)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 12.45 && shareOfWallet <= 17.52) && (totalActiveProducts > 4 && totalActiveProducts <= 6) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2291)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 12.45 && shareOfWallet <= 17.52) && (totalActiveProducts > 6)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 17.52 && shareOfWallet <= 19.86) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 2597.16)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 17.52 && shareOfWallet <= 19.86) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts <= 6) && (totalAssets <= 109606)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 17.52 && shareOfWallet <= 19.86) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts <= 6) && (totalAssets > 109606)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 17.52 && shareOfWallet <= 19.86) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts > 6 && totalActiveProducts <= 8) && (totalAssets <= 90125)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 17.52 && shareOfWallet <= 19.86) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts > 6 && totalActiveProducts <= 8) && (totalAssets > 90125 && totalAssets <= 109606) && (totalWebConsultationsPer60Days <= 6)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 17.52 && shareOfWallet <= 19.86) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts > 6 && totalActiveProducts <= 8) && (totalAssets > 90125 && totalAssets <= 109606) && (totalWebConsultationsPer60Days > 6)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 17.52 && shareOfWallet <= 19.86) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts > 6 && totalActiveProducts <= 8) && (totalAssets > 109606)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets <= 90125)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 90125 && totalAssets <= 109606) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 2597.16)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 90125 && totalAssets <= 109606) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts <= 6)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (totalAssets > 90125 && totalAssets <= 109606) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 2597.16 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 3583.82) && (totalActiveProducts > 6 && totalActiveProducts <= 8)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 19.86 && shareOfWallet <= 22.41) && (isNull(totalAssets) OR (totalAssets > 109606 && totalAssets <= 142235)) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 2597.16))

formula.name: flagSafetySeekersMember
formula.expr: ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 7.37 && satisfaction <= 7.76) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 1527.56)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 7.76 && satisfaction <= 8.43) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 1451.82 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 1527.56) && (totalWebConsultationsPer60Days <= 4)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 7.76 && satisfaction <= 8.43) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 1527.56)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 8.43 && satisfaction <= 8.80) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 1451.82 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 1527.56)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 8.43 && satisfaction <= 8.80) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 1527.56)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 8.80)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 9.56 && shareOfWallet <= 12.45)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 12.45 && shareOfWallet <= 17.52) && (totalActiveProducts <= 3)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 12.45 && shareOfWallet <= 17.52) && (totalActiveProducts > 3 && totalActiveProducts <= 4) && (totalAssets <= 38528)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 12.45 && shareOfWallet <= 17.52) && (totalActiveProducts > 4 && totalActiveProducts <= 6) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 2291) && (totalAssets <= 90125) && (totalWebConsultationsPer60Days <= 4))

formula.name: flagTraditionalistsMember
formula.expr: ((shareOfWallet > 5 && shareOfWallet <= 6) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 1527.56)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 6 && shareOfWallet <= 7) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 1527.56)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction <= 7.37)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 7.37 && satisfaction <= 7.76) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 1369.53)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 7.37 && satisfaction <= 7.76) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 1369.53 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 1451.82)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 7.37 && satisfaction <= 7.76) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 1451.82 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 1527.56)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 7.76 && satisfaction <= 8.43) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 1369.53)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 7.76 && satisfaction <= 8.43) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 1369.53 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 1451.82) && (totalWebConsultationsPer60Days <= 2)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 7.76 && satisfaction <= 8.43) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 1369.53 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 1451.82) && (totalWebConsultationsPer60Days > 2)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 7.76 && satisfaction <= 8.43) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 1451.82 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 1527.56) && (totalWebConsultationsPer60Days > 4)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 8.43 && satisfaction <= 8.80) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 1369.53)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 7 && shareOfWallet <= 9.56) && (satisfaction > 8.43 && satisfaction <= 8.80) && (monthlyIncomeReal > 1369.53 && monthlyIncomeReal <= 1451.82))

((shareOfWallet > 22.41) && (totalAssets > 142235) && (satisfaction > 7.37 && satisfaction <= 8.10) && (totalActiveProducts > 8 && totalActiveProducts <= 10)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 22.41) && satisfaction <= 8.10) && (totalActiveProducts > 10) && (age > 41)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 22.41) && (totalAssets > 142235) && (satisfaction > 8.10 && satisfaction <= 8.80) && (totalActiveProducts <= 8)) OR ((shareOfWallet > 22.41) && (totalAssets > 142235) && (satisfaction > 8.10 && satisfaction <= 8.80) && (totalActiveProducts > 8 && totalActiveProducts <= 10) && (monthlyIncomeReal <= 3964.82)) OR formula.name: testShown
formula.expr: (ABgroup == 'group A' || propensityCarLoanModel > 74)? 'show banner A': (ABgroup == 'group B')? 'show banner B': 'show default banner'
